title: Endura goes grav grav with Fall/Winter GV500 gravel clothing
content:
Endura is prepping for the frosty seasons with a line of gravel and adventure-specific clothing designed to keep riders comfortable and dry as the weather gets gnarly. The Scottish company created the new Endura GV500 series with input from adventure cyclists James Haydon (among others) and crafted the garments to work in concert with one

The post Endura goes grav grav with Fall/Winter GV500 gravel clothing appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Andrew Marshall
